extendedInfo.description: Financius is a simple application that helps you log and track your expenses and keep an eye on your balance.Please note: this is a BETA version so expect a lot of new features coming out soon! Thank you for your patience and good reviews!Features:- Most relevant information at a glance: balance in all accounts, expense and income for current month, categories that you are spending the most- Multiple accounts with separate balances- Transfer money between accounts- Update account balance when you forget to enter some transactions to reflect real balance- Some categories have been created for you, but you can always create more- Track expenses based on category- DashClock extension - Holo styleTo join beta channel for app updates, join this community https://plus.google.com/communities/105052097023793642366Then go to this URL to enable beta channel updates https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.code44.financeIf you have any requests or suggestions, write me an email or go to https://trello.com/board/financius/5133d5addbec8db6430086de and leave a comment in suggestions card and vote for what you would like to see next

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to csv import. Latest update also seems to have broken ability to select Main Category so can\'t add any new categories in Income section! Other than that latest update is ace!!!

reviews.title: Nice UI, almost complete app
reviews.comment: Works acceptably. The only two things missing are: making use of dropbox/gdrive and a chart of the weekly expenses

reviews.title: Simple & awesome
reviews.comment: I like the simplicity and elegant style. Awesome nice works dudes. 99/100 for the layout.
reviews.author: Suresh Mathew

reviews.title: Fastest expense entry
reviews.comment: Beautiful app, with the fastest expense data entry ever seen, also excellent for low-resolution screens (the keyboard never gets accidentally in the view). Clean, complete and with an excellent language localization. There is not enough contrast between the text and the background in the context menu. It could add custom colors to categories and display such colors in the graph. It could also add some custom report. Could not search, filter by category or sort the records. Will pay for a pro version.
reviews.author: Marco Tessarotto

reviews.title: Great for tracking expenses
reviews.comment: Love that it is completely free. An amazing app to use. Much better than other paid alternatives.
reviews.author: Santosh Machiraju

reviews.title: Very simple and useful
reviews.comment: Nice UI. Simple and useful. It is more than what I need...which is very good! Thx
reviews.author: Hang Wong

reviews.title: Nice UI and functional
reviews.comment: Giving 5 star in hope,  dev will add widget support and recurring income /expense. Dropbox/Drive sync with automatic daily backup option is most important than anything else.
reviews.author: Aynkaran Ramachandiran

reviews.title: V easy n useful
reviews.comment: Excellent app for keeping track of your finances. Highly recommended. Only improvement I can suggest is more customising options
reviews.author: Sahumulla Saud

reviews.title: New Subcategories
reviews.comment: Really love this app. It\'s easy to use and have a great UI. The only thing I\'m wondering, is it possible for us ti create new subcategories? So far I\'ve only been able to create new Main Categories
reviews.author: Jazreen Azman

reviews.title: Features Needed:
reviews.comment: 1) Attach photo to expenses   2) Import CSV   3) Backup to cloud services   4)Charts for categories (Ex: Food expenses breakdown)   5) One-Touch Add Expense Widget
reviews.author: Alex Abdo

reviews.title: Great. Can we have an import .csv feature
reviews.comment: Great app. Simple and functional UI. Pie chart is great for comparison. An import .csv feature would be great.  Privacy not good enough even though one uses lock screen. Screenshot of the app with all details remains in most recent apps.
reviews.author: Nicolas Ladouce

reviews.title: A good clean Very Simple app
reviews.comment: When I first used this app I thought it was the best one of its kind, then I found that you couldn\'t even set a recurring income!
reviews.author: Joe Manuel

reviews.title: Great app, just wish it had sync.
reviews.comment: I have two devices on which I would like to use this app, but the fact that there is no automatic sync feature makes this app limited for me.   Otherwise, it is no doubt the best finance manager on Android. I\'ve tried all of them, literally.
reviews.author: Zain Mehdi

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Clean ui,  easy interface..  One request is to be able to adjust the begining of the month to my pay day!!  So its easier to track my salary  Good work though
reviews.author: Mena Wilson

reviews.title: No recurring income
reviews.comment: Best design! Best visuals. Best everything. Except no recurring transactions / income. Will be a 5 with that.

reviews.title: Great UI
reviews.comment: The interface is great! It would be even better, if it allows users to see the chart of income.
reviews.author: Shao-an Lin

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: A request. Can you add monthly payment? For example for school fees etc?  Beautiful ui!
reviews.author: Prajwal Bellakka

reviews.title: Great, but one feature request
reviews.comment: This app does everything I want from an account management standpoint.  My only feature request is in regards to the DashClock plug-in: please allow selection of which accounts to show
reviews.author: Tim B

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Really good design and easy to use. But is there a way I can sync between multiple devices (phone, tablet)?
reviews.author: daniel massey

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Easy to use.. Nice interface Let me knw hw to add a new subcategories after adding a categorty?
reviews.author: Beniel Ben
